43005032	Pa non kan la unama ga baisong me rulam. Ga orit uriro ties la baisong me rulam la migat o. Non la unama, irie gat la ume uaramo ubi ga tavuk tuang. Ga orit, uriro ties la uaramo la migat o.”
43005033	“Tie, tinan la masagaming ga mela ai Ioanes. Ga baisong ara o ties migat.
43005034	Pa tale kan tuario bais maiong inamaniap, pa tuaramam miriro tiesiap muana la narung meba ina milagiang Morowa.
43005035	Ioanes la are lalabie la ulabie ga uala lalabie maun teip ga magaulap. Ga at tara ila popoi la temeba dalap mi me lalabie ang.
43005036	Pa mating non kaguma la okurupin nanam a Ioanes ga misingtuala turuo aga. Miriro ubiap la ualam Mamo toun meba makosartang ga itamum. Miriro ubiap la tume makosar la baismeng maset mai teip ga magaulap gare ro, Mamo la tosagaong ga muruo na kimanam.
43005037	Ga irie kan la baisong ara me rulam. Pa tale kan puoming meba miptang ma kigip mi o magimaming ma irap mi.
43005038	Ga ties gat ang la tale kan iot miun. Karuk. Muana la tale naganming iro ties tung, la tosagaong Mamo ga muruo.”
43005039	“Man ubiming maranit la man mavasming babap onim tinan la ualo Morowa miun. Memani, man naganming leba omiuluo eba omila ninimiap ula iot atatan makin. Tie, babap am Morowa la mime bais me rulam.
43005040	Pa tale iga mumiong toi meba omila ninimiap.
43005041	Upien maiong inamaniap la tale kan tume orula.
43005042	Pa mirit ubonuvarap ang Morowa la tale kan iot na dalap mi.
43005043	Muruo na bonim a Mamo ruang, pa tale kan iga miptang ties tung ga omila. Karuk. Pa leba muong migana ba na bonim a kan, tie eba naming aime ga eba kakalait omila ties ang.
43005044	Mimi, teip ga magaulap lare tiro la tale kan puomeng meba naganmeng ira ruo. Karuk kan! Memani, mitara kadikming meba miarang bonim ula kakanu maun garip mim kan. Are ratmat ga tale iga miarang bonim ula kakanu aun Morowa la ume ualo maun teip ga magaulap.
43005045	Pa baraba naganming ga mimama eba mitabung na ties ai Mamo. Karuk. Migana la eba miabung na ties, irie Moses. Pa naganming miga Moses la eba miagaalie.
43005046	Leba naganming migat ties ang Moses la omirong, tie eba gat naganming ties tung. Memani, tiesiap la mamirong Moses la tiesmeng it me rulam.
43005047	Pa mirit ara, tale kan naganming migat iro ties ang Moses, are ratmat ga tala kan naganming iro ties tung gat.”
43006001	Urie, tubiat na iriro tara, Iesu la ula labinim ga unum tomat na taralap o kin Galili. Non bonim o uriro pirom Tiberias.
43006002	Ga papot ma teip ga magaulap la man ameuluan. Memani, magimameng papot ma kagup onim na panbinim ga mamumuriraong non ara non ara tafaiap maiam teip ga magaulap.
43006003	Are ratmat ga ula Iesu nakap bo pugama ga unama ga lop am o usingnualap.
43006004	Makosarong Iesu miriro pagap na la ula kakanu maiong Iudaiap la meivo la ula aipieng, la muior kagarat.
43006005	Iesu la ui tapmat ga magimaong papot teip ga magaulap la mumaio kagarat ai. Are ratmat ga amarikong Filip gare ro, “Eba oubing purun lagum meba bualang parak maun miriro teip ga magaulap?”
43006006	Iesu la ait ara mani leba akosarang, pa namot omerang nagan ang Filip. Are ratmat ga amarikong a iriro paga.
43006007	Filip la upulo ties ang ga ugama, “Leba oubing purun a iriro 1,000 ma Kinap eba tale puomeng ira ma teip ga magaulap.”
43006008	Non kulot o usingnualap Andreas, papa ang Simon Petro la aulo Iesu,
43006009	“Non kulot isik la uariam muanam ma tatak purulup a bali ga narain tatak abulapien, pa uriro tatak parak eba tale puoieng ira ma papot teip ga magaulap lare tiro!”
43006010	Iesu la maulo lop am o usingnualap gare ro, “Mamilava teip ga magaulap meba maionang na kimanam.” Papot a palis la ut na iriro nap. Are ratmat ga mirio 5,000 ma teip la maionama lourup ga numeilup maiam.
43006011	Tie, uaram Iesu miriro muanam ma purulup a bali ga ivo temaieng ga mavuotmeng me maun teip ga magaulap. Okosarong gat gare tie ira lie abulapien. Ualam maun puoieng iro agat maiong.
43006012	Tie, na tara la parakmeng ga utmeng ara urie maulo Iesu lop am o usingnualap gare ro, “Mipamum napup ma muanam ma purulup la tale itmaiamuam inamaniap. Buat ogoming parak agarit.”
43006013	Are ratmat ga mepamuam napup o parak la maiot ka ga masuvarameng 12 ma keip.
43006014	Tara la agimameng teip ga magaulap iriro paga o turupnuabap la akosarong Iesu, pumaiaro la man tiesmeng kabirana ma gare ro, “Migat ara, iriro migana irie unuli la pame auanpala meba muong.”
43006015	Pa mait Iesu namo umaiaring a ga maiabung meba irie ba orong maiang. Are ratmat ga maulai ga ulat talamet nakap bo pugama.
43006016	Tie, nabit ara, lop am Iesu o usingnualap la mela todang na kin.
43006017	Tegomeng bo non obinam ga ogoratmeng kin ga mela. Namo mela na taun Kaperenaum. Arubu ra pa tale ka betong Iesu mai. Karuk ka.
43006018	Tie, non ifif ula mamaranu la betieng ga baulup mila kakanim la temaiara.
43006019	Labapmaira bo obinam ga mela puoieng ma 5 ma o 6 ma kilometap, pa tale ka betmeng labinim. Na iriro tara agimameng Iesu la unum nakap bo burunam ga muo kagarat u obinam maiong. Agimameng ga merau maset, memani, agatmeng la namo ga irier kuraima ba.
43006020	Pa maulo Iesu, “Turuot tiro. Buat mirau.”
43006021	Ameit irie Iesu, tie, namo alagimeng me muong bo obinam. Pa tale kagat ga betieng ara obinam na uriro pianam la namo mela una.
43006022	Urie, o non la malonim, teip ga magaulap la man maionama ka toma na taralap o kin, ga timoi karuk kan o noba obinam. Namurit it la iot. Ameit Iesu la tale tegoong bo uriro obinam ga lop am o usingnualap, karuk. Lop am o usingnualap kan la tegomeng bo uriro obinam ga mela.
43006023	Pa non obip onim Tiberias la mumaio kagarat na uriro pianam Ila Kakani la ualo temaieng me purun ga maio.
43006024	Teip ga magaulap la umai pa tale agimameng Iesu ga lop am o usingnualap la tale kan maionama, are ratmat ga tegomeng bo non obip ga mela na taun Kaperenaum meba amaioping Iesu. Ugama Iesu, “Turuo purun onim na panbinim.”
43006025	Tara la amaiop ara toma na taralap o kin urie man amarikmeng gare ro, “Migana o usingnualap, namuk la munuo togo?”
43006026	Iesu la upulo ties maiong gare ro, “Mirulo migat Tale kan toisinming muana la magimaming miriro kagup onim na panbinim la makosartung. Karuk. Mio urie purun la tualo miun ga utmeng karip mi, ga met iriro muana ga man toisinming.
43006027	Babun man miaro non ara parak onim na kimanam la ime no. Pa mumuru le miarang non ara parak la eba maagailie muranap mi ga maionang maset mar mirie lap. Uro parak, urie la turuo kan. Migana migat ang Morowa la eba talang miun. Memani, Morowa Mamo la toabu ga uala kaguma toun.”
43006028	Are ratmat ga amarikmeng Iesu, “Eba mani le akosarpang meba okosarpang ubi ang Morowa?”
43006029	Upulo Iesu ties maiong gare ro, “Ubi la ualo Morowa miun la are ro: naganming ira ruo, iriro migana la asagaong Morowa ga muo na kimanam.”
43006030	Mepulo ties ang Iesu gare ro, “Eba akosarnang man paga o turupnuabap meba pasingnala ga naganpang iro ties nung? Eba okosarnang man ubi?
43006031	Eap pam la maio Mana na pianam la karuk ma inamaniap, are babam ula puaru la tiesieng, ‘Ualo purun onim na panbinim maun ga maio.’”
43006032	Pa ugama Iesu maime, “Mirulo migat. Tale Moses irie la ualo purun onim na panbinim miun. Karuk. Mamo ruang la ume ualo purun migat miun onim na panbinim.
43006033	Memani, uriro purun la ualo Morowa, urie la oiolai panbinim ga muio lourup ga ialo ninimiap maun teip ga magaulap onim na uro kimanam.”
43006034	Megama aime Iesu, “Ila Kakani, eba man nalang uriro purun busit paun.”
43006035	Tie, ugama Iesu maime, “Turuo kan purun o ninimiap. Migana la muo toi, tala kan tafaong me parak. Pa migana la naganong ira ruo, tala gat ourama me tapnuap.
43006036	Pa mirulo: Togimaming ara, pa tale kan naganming.
43006037	Mirier teip ga magaulap ganam la ualam Mamo toun, eba mumaiong toi. Pa migana ga magabun la mumaio toi, tala kan makalarung. Karuk. Eba narang maime.
43006038	Tale kan maruo na panbinim ga muruo lourup meba orauluo agat tung kan. Karuk. Muruo lourup meba orauluo agat ang irie la tosagaong ga muruo.
43006039	Agat ang irie la tosagaong ga muruo la are ro: Tala kan arulai noba ma inamaniap o magaulap la ualam ara toun. Karuk. Pa eba ina temum na la ula kakanu o ties.
43006040	Eva, agat ang ira ruang la are ro: Mirier teip ga magaulap ganam la togimameng turuo Poi ang ga naganmeng ira ruo, eba omela ninimiap la iot maset atatan makin. Ga eba temum na nuvarap na urie la lagorang.”
43006041	Tie, Iesu la tiesong, “Turuo kan uriro purun la maio na panbinim ga muio to lourup.” Tiesong gare ro ga bukbukmeng Iudaiap ga mitara tiesmeng papot me ira a.
43006042	Megama, “Iriro migana irie Iesu, poi ang Iosep. Abit it mamo ang ga naga ang. Are mani ga ugama, ‘Maruo na panbinim ga muruo lourup?’”
43006043	Ugama Iesu maime, “Baraba tigit man tiesming kabirana mi.
43006044	Leba tale alang Mamo ruang kukunim aun migana, tie, tale kan puoong meba muong toi.
43006045	Ties la iot na babam maiong unulip, ‘Morowa leba masingala mirie teip ga magaulap.’ Mirie inamaniap la mepto ties ang Mamo ga amera maset, mime mumaio toi.
43006046	Karuk kan a noba migana la agimaong Mamo. Karuk. Turuot, iriro migana la unama ga Morowa ga muo, turuot la agimarung.
43006047	Mirulo migat. Migana la naganong ira ruo, eba oala ninimiap la iot atatan makin.
43006048	Turuo kan uriro purun la ialo ninimiap maun teip ga magaulap.
43006049	Tinan eap mim la maio iriro mana na kimanam la karuk ma inamaniap pa mevara ra.
43006050	Pa uriro purun la maio tatuan na panbinim ga muio lourup. Are ratmat ga leba ong migana ba, tala kan uvara.
43006051	Turuo kan uriro purun la ame ninimiap la maio na panbinim ga muio to lourup. Leba ong migana ba uriro purun, eba amaning ninimiap ula pareieng. Pa uriro purun leba talang maun, mirie neip tuo. Tualam meba omela teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam ninimiap.”
43006052	Iesu la tiesong gare tiro pa Iudaiap la man nemenam o ties kabirana ma kan. Megama, “Eba alam iriro migana neip a gare mani buun meba bum?”
43006053	Ugama Iesu, “Mirulo migat, leba tale miom neip tuo Migana migat ang Morowa, ga leba tale tapmio a olabuan tuo, tala kan omila ninimiap.
43006054	Migana la ume um neip tuo ga tapu a olabuan tuo, eba oala ninimiap la iot maset atatan makin, ga eba temung na una na uriro la lagorang.
43006055	Memani, neip tuo urie parak migat, ga olabuan tuo irie paga migat me tapnuap.
43006056	Man migana la um neip tuo ga tapu a olabuan tuo, tie unama ira ruo ga turuo gat leba tonang ira a.
43006057	Mamo la amaning ninimiap ga tosagaong ga muruo. Ga mating ninimiap muana ira Mamo. Aret tiro, migana la um neip tuo, eba oala ninimiap.
43006058	Uriro purun la maio na panbinim ga muio to lourup na kimanam. Tale kan kaina gare purun tinan la maio eap mim ga mevara. Karuk. Migana la u uriro purun, eba oala ninimiap ula iot maset atatan makin.”
43006059	Iesu la baisong o uriro ties na luguan o usingnualap na tara la masinguala teip ga magaulap na taun Kaparenaum.
43006060	Tie, papot ma lop am Iesu o usingnualap la mepto uriro ties ga megama, “Urogo ties la mitara mamaranu. Aga la puoong meba aptang ga oauluo, a?”
43006061	Pa Iesu la mait dalap ma lop am o usingnualap la man tiesmeng papot me uriro ties la uaramo. Are ratmat ga maulo, “Uriro ties la makiraraieng dalap mi, a?
43006062	Tie, leba agimaming Poi ang migana la eba ala nakap na urie pianam la unama tinan una, eba are ba mani?
43006063	Muranama kan Ila Babai la ume ualo ninimiap maun teip ga magaulap. Neip la tale kan puomeng meba miagamelie ga miarang ninimiap, karuk. Miriro tiesiap la tualam miun, irie muranama ga ame ninimiap.
43006064	Pa non inamaniap kabirana mi la tale kan naganmeng iro uriro ties. Memani, tinan kan Iesu la mait ara teip la tale naganmeng. Ga ait gat iriro non leba alang na kilalap ma karorap.
43006065	Ga ugama Iesu, “Irirot muana ga mirulo, leba tale alang Mamo ruang kukunim aun migana ba, tie, tale kan puoong meba muong toi.”
43006066	Na iriro tara Iesu la uaramo uriro ties, tie, papot ma lop am o usingnualap la amaiolai ga tale gat ameuluan. Karuk.
43006067	Are ratmat ga mamarikong Iesu 12 ma lop am, “Atabo mimi gat la miga tomiolaing ga mila a?”
43006068	Simon Petro la upulo ties ang gare ro, “Ila Kakani, eba pala ai aga gat? Maning mirier tiesiap o ninimiap la maiot atatan makin.
43006069	Pa naganpang ga nopetara nunuo Karisito ga nunuo migana Ila Babai ang Morowa.”
43006070	Iesu la upulo ties maiong ga ugama, “Are mani atabo maiterung it 12 ma lop tuam o usingnualap, a? Pa irie non narit kabirana mi la amaning muranama ila kire na dalap a.”
43006071	Tiesong aime Iudas, poi ang Simon Iskariot. Memani, Irie non kabirana ma 12 ma lop o usingnualap, pa tubiat leba alang Iesu na kilalap ma inamaniap ga eba menamung ga aving.
43007001	Urie, tubiat a iriro paga, Iesu la unama na nap iang provins Galili. Tale gat naong meba amung gat na provins Iudaia. Memani teip mila kakanim onim Iudaia la namo menamung ga aving.
43007002	Tie, na irie tara, la o sabat maiong Iudaiap la muior kagarat. Uriro la o sabat la meivo la o aganuliap me luguan o ifif.
43007003	Are ratmat ga papap am Iesu la megama aime, “Ei, onolaing uriro pianam ga nala na provins Iudaia, meba magimameng lop nuam o usingnualap ubiap la makosarnung.
43007004	Leba noba migana la naong meba ameira inamaniap, tale kan ume makosar ubiap na nap ila kagouri. Leba nama makosarnang miriro pagap o turupnuabap, tie makosarnang la uakap meba magimameng teip ga magaulap.”
43007005	Memani, papap am gat la tale kan naganmeng gare ro Iesu irie Karisito. Are ratmat ga tiesmeng gare tiro.
43007006	Ugama Iesu maime, “Tara ruang la tale ka betong titot. Pa puoming it meba mila na provins Iudaia.
43007007	Teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam la tale kan puomeng meba nekaromela ga mimi. Pa nekaromela ga turuo. Memani, tume ties me tavukup maiam mila kiram la mime makosar.
43007008	Mimi kan le mila ga ogimaming la o aganuliap. Pa turuo la tala kan tula na uriro la o aganuliap. Tara ruang ila muri la tale ka betong.”
43007009	Tiesong gare tiro mai papap am ga man uanula ka na provins Galili.
43007010	Pa papap am Iesu la melar meba ogimameng la o aganuliap, tubiat irie gat la ula. Tale kan ula betong la uakap na pianam. Karuk. Man unum it ga man ula tigit.
43007011	Teip mila kakanim onim Iudaia la man aisinmeng na uriro la o aganuliap ga megama, “Iriro migana lagum la unama?”
43007012	Ga teip ga magaulap la mitara tiesmeng papot aime. Mirie la megama, “Irie migana ila mumuri.” Pa mirie la megama, “Karuk, ume mavana teip ga magaulap.”
43007013	Pa merau me Iudaiap mila uke ga karuk kan a noba migana le aramang ties ba aime la uakap.
43007014	Tie, kabirana o uriro la o aganuliap, ula Iesu betong na luguan o lotu ga baisong mai teip ga magaulap.
43007015	Teip mila kakanim onim Iudaia la turupmaiaba kirat ga megama, “Are mani ga amaning iriro migana uriro agat? Abit ara irie la tale kan ula na usingnualap.”
43007016	Iesu la upulo ties gare ro, “Uriro ties la tuaramo, la tale tung kan. Karuk. Ang Morowa, irie la tosagaong ga muruo.
43007017	Leba migana ba o magabun ba la namo oauluo ties ang Morowa, eba aera muana o uriro ties la tuaramo. Eba oera migat, uriro ties la maio aun Morowa, o atabo tuaramot na agat tung it.
43007018	Migana la okosarong ties o agat kan ang, la namo oala bonim ula kakanu. Pa migana la namo aving bonim ula kanu me aun iriro la asagaong ga muo, irie migana ila puvuvui, ga karuk kan o kiribas ba ang.
43007019	Tinan Moses la ualo maimai miun. Pa karuk kan a migana ba kabirana mi la ouluan maimai. Pa memani ga miga tominamung ga taving?”
43007020	Teip ga magaulap la mepulo ties ang ga megama, “Non muranama ila kire la ut ira nuo. Aga la namo noanamung ga naving?”
43007021	Upulo Iesu ties maiong ga ugama, “Okosartung non ubi na la o lotu ga amumurirarung non migana, pa mimi ganam la agatming papot.
43007022	Moses la uala tavuk o kasau miun. Migat Iriro tavuk la tale mavuo aun Moses. Mavuo maun tatimup. Pa mime makasau tatak lop na la o aganuliap gat.
43007023	Miga omiuluo maset maimai ang Moses la mime ogirip papak a kulot na la o lotu. Tie, na la o agnuliap la mamurirarung neip a non migana, pa memani ga papamnam dalap mi me rulam?
43007024	Baraba mavuvuoming it pagap ma irap mi. Agatming ka maset ga mavuvuoming pagap ganam la makosartung a tavuk ila puvuvui!”
43007025	Pa non teip ga magaulap onim Ierusalem la megama, “Iriro i migana la namo menamung ga aving.
43007026	Pa agimaming! Man tiesong la uakap, ga tale kan maiaramo ties ba aime. Atabo migat teip mila uke la amit, irie Karisito?
43007027	Pa obit maset pianam ang iriro migana. Pa tara leba betang Karisito, karuk kan a noba migana leba oera pianam ang.”
43007028	Iesu la man uaramo ties mai inamaniap na luguan o lotu. Ga marikong maranit gare ro, “Eva, tomit ara ga omit gat pianam tung! Pa tale kan muruo un agat tung kan. Mamo la tosagaong ga muruo. Tavuk ang la migat a. Pa tale amit.
43007029	Pa turuo la arit. Muana la tunama ga irie ga tosagaong ga muruo.”
43007030	Iesu la uaramo uriro ties, are ratmat ga namo avismeng teip mila uke. Pa tara ang o nuvarap la tale ka betong. Are ratmat ga karuk kan a migana ba la uat a kilan a ga abung na luguan o arubu. Karuk.
43007031	Pa papot ma teip ga magaulap kabirana ma la naganmeng ira ga megama, “Tara leba betang Karisito, atabo eba makosarang papot ma kagup onim na panbinim ga eba makurupmeling kagup onim na panbinim la makosarong iriro migana?”
43007032	Urie, Parasaiop la meptam inamaniap la man maiaramam non ara non ara tiesiap me Iesu. Are ratmat ga miridaip mila kakanim ga Parasaiop la masagameng non teip la maiario kier meba umaiaring a Iesu ga avismeng.
43007033	Tie, ugama Iesu, “Tatak it tara la tunama ga mimi, ga eba ina tala ai irie la tosagaong ga muruo togo.
43007034	Ga eba man toisinming pa eba tale togimaming. Ga tale kan puoming meba mila na urie pianam leba tonang una.”
43007035	Teip mila uke onim Iudaia la man nemamarikmeng kabirana ma kan gare ro, “Tubiat eba ala lagum ga tala kan puobung meba abuving, a? Atabo eba ala mai garip buam na pianam maiong Grikip, ga eba man masingala Grikip o ties ang, a?
43007036	Ugama, ‘Eba man toisinming pa tala kan togimaming’, ga ugama gat, ‘Tala kan puoming meba mila na urie pianam la tunama una.’ Man muana o uriro ties?”
43007037	La lakorang o uriro la o aganuliap ma luguap o ifif la are la ula kakanu maset. Na urie la dusong Iesu ga marikong maranit me teip ga magaulap gare ro, “Leba noba migana la namo tapo o burunam, tie, muong toi ga tapo.
43007038	Memani, umir ang Morowa la igama, ‘Migana la naganong ira ruo, papot o burunam leba betieng na dalap a ga eba iriva ga ila. Uriro burunam la eba ialang ninimiap la iot atatan makin aun.’”
43007039	Iesu la tiesong me Muranama Ila Babai. Man migana la naganong ira, eba aala iriro Muranama Ila Babai. Pa Muranama Ila Babai la tale ka muo na irie tara. Memani, Iesu la tale ka oula bonim ula kakanu aun Morowa.
43007040	Tie, tara la mepta teip ga magaulap la uaramo uriro ties, non kabirana ma la megama, “Migat ara, iriro migana la irie unuli, umir ang Morowa la tiesieng aime leba muong na kimanam.”
43007041	Mirie la megama, “Irie Karisito a.” Pa mirie la megama, “Karuk. Irie migana la avuoong Morowa, eba tale betang Galili. Karuk. Are mani ga eba betang Karisito Galili, a?”
43007042	Babam ula puaru la tiesieng ara, ‘Karisito la irie o butamat ang Devit, ga eba betang na pianam Betilem, uriro pianam tinan la unama Devit una.’
43007043	Are ratmat ga neratmeng teip ga magaulap me na narain garipien muana ira Iesu.
43007044	Mirie la nameng la namo avismeng, pa karuk kan a noba migana la uabua kilan ira meba uaring a.
43007045	Tie, tubiat teip mila maiario kier la ina mela mai miridaip mila kakanim ga Parasaiop. Ga mamarikmeng, “Memani ga tale alagiming me togo?”
43007046	Ga mepulo teip mila maiario kier ties gare ro, “Tinan ga puoieng titot, karuk kan a noba migana la ume ties gare iriro migana la ume ties.”
43007047	Are ratmat ga mepulo Parasaiop ties gare ro, “Atabo mivanaong gat, a?
43007048	Atabo ira gar pang teip mila uke ga Parasaiop, agimaming noba migana la naganong ira? Karuk kan!
43007049	Pa miriro gar ma teip ga magaulap la tale kan omait maimai, Morowa leba makirara ang!”
43007050	Nikodimo, iriro migana tinan la ula ai Iesu na arubu, irie a gar maiang Parasaiop, la ugama,
43007051	“Atabo maimai buong la tiesieng meba buabung agarit migana na ties? Karuk. Buptang ka lake ties ang, meba maset abira paga la akosarong!”
43007052	Pa mepulo teip mila uke ties ang gare ro, “Memani, atabo nunuo gat nunuo migana onim Galili, a? Ovasnang maset babam ula puaru, meba onera. Karuk kan a noba unuli leba betang na provins Galili.” [
43007053	Mirier teip ga magaulap ganam la mela tapmat na luguap maiam na tara la nor la o aganuliap.]
43008001	Urie, Iesu la ula bo pugama Oliva.
43008002	Urie, parabira namur, inagat ula na luguan o lotu. Ga papot teip ga magaulap la mumaio mepto ties ang. Are ratmat ga ula unama ga man masinguala.
43008003	Na tara la man tiesong Iesu, teip mila o it maset maimai ga gar ma Parasaiop la maialo non magabun non garip la ogimameng la okiraraieng magi. Are ratmat ga merilio uriro magabun kabirana ma.
43008004	Ga amelo Iesu gare ro, “Migana o usingnualap, uriro magabun la okiraraieng magi ga ogimameng.
43008005	Na maimai buong, Moses la tiesong gare ro, ‘Ovurebuong magabun are riro a tadas ga iving.’ Pa tiesnung gare mani?”
43008006	Tiesmeng gare tiro muana la namo avanameng meba aramang ties ba ula kiro meba maiabung na ties. Pa man kumuong Iesu me lourup ga man umirong na kimanam o kanevunam a.
43008007	Man amarikmeng ga man amarikmeng, pa dusong ga maulo, “Aga migana kabirana mi la tale amaning kirinim, tie lake obaleang uriro magabun a natauan tandas ga iving.”
43008008	Tiesong gare tiro, tie inagat kumuong ga umirong na kimanam.
43008009	Teip mila kakanim la mepto uriro ties ga mirier ganam ut narit narit la mulimeba ga miura me lavie. Teip mila uke la mela lake, pa mirie non la meuluo. Iesu iriet narit la unama ga magabun la man dusieng ka.
43008010	Urie, dusong Iesu ga omarikong uriro magabun, “Magabun, lagim inamaniap? Atabo karuk kan a noba migana la nouabu na ties me uriro kirinim, a?”
43008011	Igama magabun, “Ila Kakani, karuk kan a noba.” Pa oulo Iesu, “Turuo gat la tale kan noruabu na ties. Nala ra ga tubiat baraba gat okosarnung kirinim.”
43008012	Uriro magabun la ila ra. Tie, Iesu la inagat maulo teip ga magaulap, “Turuo lalabie onim na kimanam. Man migana la upto ties tung ga touluo, eba tale amung na arubu pa eba amaning lalabie o ninimiap.”
43008013	Parasaiop la mepto uriro ties ang, are ratmat ga abukmela gare ro, “Baisnung kan me nulam. Are ratmat ga baisiap nuam la tale kan migat ma.”
43008014	Pa upulo Iesu ties maiong ga ugama, “Migat, bais tung kan me rulam. Pa tale kan tokarabi. Tiestung la migat o. Memani, orit pianam la teruara una ga muruo. Ga are gat to, orit pianam la tuga tala una. Pa mimi la tale amit muana o pianam tung. Ga eba tala lagum, uriro gat ga tale omit.
43008015	Mimi la mimet mavuvuo inamaniap a tavuk onim na kimanam. Pa tale kan tume avuvuo migana ba.
43008016	Pa leba avuvuorang migana, eba avuvuorang puvut. Memani, talet turuo talamet la avuvurung. Karuk. Mamo la tosagaong ga muruo, irie la ubiong ga turuo.
43008017	Na maimai ang Moses omiuluo ties la iot gare ro, ‘Leba narain ba teivien la baisliong o namurit ties, tie baisliong ga migat o.’
43008018	Tie, turuo kan la tume bais me rulam kan, ga Mamo la tosagaong ga muruo, irie gat la ume bais me rulam.”
43008019	Pa amarikmeng gare ro, “Lagi Mamo nuang?” Upulo Iesu ties maiong gare ro, “Tale tomit ga tale kan amit Mamo ruang. La tomit, tie eba amira Mamo ruang.”
43008020	Iesu la uaramam miriro tiesiap na kabin la mime mumaio miabu inamaniap kamniap ana, na tara la masinguala teip ga magaulap na luguan o lotu. Are ratmat ga karuk kan a migana ba la uat a ga avisang. Memani, tara ang me nuvarap la tale ka betong.
43008021	Tie, inagat maulo Iesu Parasaiop gare ro, “Eba tala ga tala gat puoming meba tomioping. Ga eba man miving pa kirinim ming la eba kan man iot. Tale kan puoming meba mila na pianam la eba tala una.”
43008022	Are ratmat ga teip mila uke onim Iudaia la nemarikmeng kabirana ma, “Memani ga tiesong tale kan puoming meba mila na pianam leba tala una? Atabo eba teanamung ga aving, a?”
43008023	Pa maulo Iesu gare ro, “Mimi onim to lourup. Pa turuo onim nakap. Mimi onim na uro kimanam. Pa tale kan turuo onim na uro kimanam.
43008024	Are ratmat ga mirulo, eba miving, ga eba ka man iot kirinim ming. Leba tale naganming ira iriro migana la miulo, tie eba miving ga eba ka iot kirinim ming.”
43008025	Pa amarikmeng Parasaiop, “Tie, panalava nunuo aga!” Pa ugama Iesu, “Turuot iriro migana, are tinan la mirulor.
43008026	Matim papot ma tiesiap la tuga taramam a tavuk ming, ga eba avuvuorang tavuk ming are migana o ukosar o ties. Are ratmat ga irie la tosagaong ga muruo, tavuk ang la migat a. Pa mirier tiesiap la tume tuptam aun, miriet la tume tuaramam mai teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam.”
43008027	Pa tale kan ameit la maulo a Mamo.
43008028	Pa ugama Iesu maime, “Tubiat eba maiaving Poi ang migana. Na irie tara bat eba tomira, turuo irie migana. Ga eba tomira, tale kan akosartung paga ba o agat kan tung, karuk. Tume tuaramo ties are Mamo la tosinguala o.
43008029	Mamo la tosagaong ga muruo, irie la unama ga turuo. Tale kan toulai, meba turuo bat talamet le tonang. Karuk. Memani, busit la tume makosar pagap Mamo kan la naong maime.”
43008030	Tiesong gare tiro ga papot teip ga magaulap la naganmeng ira a.
43008031	Are ratmat ga maulo Iesu Iudaiap mirie mila naganang ara ira gare ro, “Leba omiuluan ties tung, tie eba mimi ba lop tuam o usingnualap migat.
43008032	Ga eba omira ties migat. Ga ties migat leba mikosarieng ga eba uakap ba ira mi.”
43008033	Pa mepulo tiesang gare ro, “Pava eap am Abraham. Karuk kan a tara ba la ponama ga okosarpang ubi agarit ang non migana. Memani ga tiesnung, ‘Eba betming ga uakap ba ira mi?’”
43008034	Ugama Iesu maime, “Mirulo migat. Mirier teip ga magaulap ganam la mime okosar kirinim, parepmeng uvat uriro kirinim maiong.
43008035	Migana o ubi la tale kan ume unama busit na luguan ang Ila Kani, Karuk. Pa Poi ang it irie la ume unama busit ana.
43008036	Are ratmat ga Poi ang la eba mikosarang ga uakap ba ira mi, uakap ara ira mi migat.
43008037	Mirit mimi eap am Abraham. Pa miga tominamung ga taving, memani, tiestung la tale kan iot na dalap mi.
43008038	Tume ties ma pagap la magimarung aun Mamo ruang. Pa mimi la mime makosar tavukup la mime miaram aun mamo ming kan.”
43008039	Mepulo tiesang Iesu, “Ira pang a Abraham.” Pa maulo Iesu, “Leba mimi ba lop am Abraham migat, tie eba makosarming mirier ubiap la makosarong Abraham.
43008040	Mirulo ma mirie tiesiap ganam o migat la tuptam aun Morowa. Pa titot la miga tominamung ga taving. Tale kan okosarong Abraham gare tiro.
43008041	Eva, akosarming migat tavuk ang mamo ming.” Teip mila uke la amelo Iesu, “Nagap pam la tale kan okoratmeng magi ga pamaiat. Pamaning it narit Mamo. Irie Morowa!”
43008042	Ugama Iesu maime, “La migat Morowa irie ira ming, eba tobomiving. Muana la tunama ga Morowa ga muruo. Tale kan muruo iro agat kan tung. Karuk. Morowa la tosagaong ga muruo.
43008043	Memani ga tale betieng tiestung la uakap na agarip mim? Muana a iriro la are ro. Tale kan puoming meba miptang ties tung. Kigip ma muranap mi la libonmeng ara.
43008044	Mimi lop am mamo ming, Satan. Are ratmat ga mitara mimamaranim la man omiuluo agat ang irie mamo ming. Tiralo kan irie migana la ume unamuam inamaniap ga mevara. Ga ume auluan tavuk o kakarabunim. Memani, tavuk o ties migat la tale kan iot na dalap a. Karuk. Tara la ume uaramo ties o kakarabunim urie tiesang la migat. Memani, irier migana o kakarabunim ga ira iang migat tavuk o ties o kakarabunim.
43008045	Are ratmat ga tale kan naganming ira ruo na tara la tume tuaramo ties migat.
43008046	Agat ming miga okosartung kirinim, a? Leba agatming gare rie, tie tomiabung na ties me iriro paga. Pa leba taramang ties migat, memani ga tale naganming ira ruo?
43008047	Lop am Morowa mirie la mime meptam mirier tiesiap am Morowa. Tale kan mimi lop am Morowa. Are ratmat ga tale kan mime mipto ties tung.”
43008048	Tie, Iudaiap la mepulo ties ang, “Ties pang migat noi. Nunuo migana onim Samaria ga non muranama ila kire la ut ira nuo.”
43008049	Pa upulo Iesu uriro ties gare ro, “Karuk kan a muranama ba ila kire la ut ira ruo. Karuk kan. Tuavio bonim a Mamo ruang, pa mime obomionama bonim tuo.
43008050	Tale kan tuavio bonim tuo kan. Pa non kan migana la man uavio bonim tuo, irie leba mavuvuoang teip ga magaulap la maialam ibup ma ira ruo.
43008051	Mirulo migat, ‘Man migana la ouluan ties tung, tala kan uvara. Karuk kan!’”
43008052	Megama Iudaiap aime, “Titot la nopetara, maning muranama ila kire la ut ira nuo. Abraham la uvara ra ga unulip la mevara ra. Pa nugama, “Man migana la ouluan maset ties tung, tala kan mevara.”
43008053	Atabo akurupnin ea buang Abraham, a? Uvara ra Abraham ga unulip gat. Agatnung la nuga aga, a?”
43008054	Tie, Iesu la upulo ties gare ro, “Leba taving kan bonim tuo me nakap, bonim tuo ula kakanu leba karuk ba a muana o. Pa Mamo ruang kan irie la uavio bonim tuo. Pa mime migama, irie Morowa buang.
43008055	Pa tale amit. Turuo la arit. La tugama, ‘Tale arit’, eba betang gare ba migana o kakarabunim gare mimi. Pa turuo la arit ara ga oruluan maset ties ang.
43008056	Ira ming, Abraham la teuba maset la namo ogimaang la rung. Eva, ogimaong ara ga temeba dalap a maset.”
43008057	Are ratmat ga amelo Iudaiap, “Kuot? Tale ka manim 50 ma karaip pa tiesnung, ‘Nugama agimanung Abraham!’”
43008058	Iesu la maulo, “Mirulo migat: Naga la tale ka iaria Abraham lake ra tunama.”
43008059	Iesu la tiesong gare tiro pa teip mila kakanim la maiaram tadasip meba abalemeng Iesu ga menamung. Pa kagouri Iesu ga aulai luguan o lotu ga ula lavie.
43009001	Urie, Iesu la unum ga ula ga agimaong non migana ila sapsapong. Tara la iaria naga ang irie la sapsapong ara.
43009002	Ga lop am Iesu la amarikmeng Iesu, “Migana o usingnualap, aga la okosarong kirinim na tara la iaria naga iriro migana ga sapsapong? Iriro migana kan la okosarong kirinim, o mamo ga naga ang la okosarliong kirinim?”
43009003	Pa upulo Iesu ties gare ro, “Iriro migana la tale okosarong kirinim, ga ira ang ga naga ang gat la tale okosarliong kirinim. Karuk. Iriro paga la betong meba ogimameng teip ga magaulap ubi ang Morowa la betieng la uakap ira iriro migana.
43009004	Titot la man ileng ka tie okosarbuong ubi ang Morowa irie la tosagaong ga muruo. Leba betieng arubu, tale kan puoong migana ba leba ubi ang.
43009005	Tara la tunama ka na uro kimanam, turuo kan lalabie o uro kimanam.”
43009006	Iesu la tiesong gare tiro, tie, kasupong na kimanam ga origiong kasup ga kimanam ga uabu uriro kimanam na irap a iriro sapsap.
43009007	Ga aulo Iesu gare ro, “Nala naviet na kin Siloam.” Origibuong uriro bonim o ties onim lakuan buong gare ro, “Asagameng ga ula.” Tie iriro sapsap la ula ga uviet. Pa tara la ina terigiong, puoong bat meba magimaang maset pagap.
43009008	Inamaniap onim na pianam ang ga inamaniap la mime agima tinan, tara la ume maika inamaniap ma kakepup ga pagap meba maialam aun, la megama, “Are mani? Atabo irirot. Migana tinan la ume unama ga ume maika inamaniap ma kakepup?”
43009009	Mirie la megama, “Eva, iriet migana.” Pa mirie la megama, “Karuk. Kaunat gare iruo migana, pa irie la non ara.” Pa iriro kan migana la ugama, “Turuot.”
43009010	Are ratmat ga amarikmeng, “Are mani ga mumurun irapien nuo?”
43009011	Pa upulo ties maiong gare ro, “Iriro migana la meiva Iesu, irie la origiong kimanam ga kasup ga uabu na irapien tuo. Ga toulo, ‘Nala na kin o burunam Siloam ga naviet.’ Are ratmat ga tula ga tuviet ga mumurun irapien tuo ga puorung bat meba maset magimarang pagap.”
43009012	Ga amarikmeng, “Iriro migana lagum la unama?” Pa ugama, “Tale arit.”
43009013	Tie, alagimeng iriro migana tinan la sapsapong ga mela maiala maun Parasaiop.
43009014	Urie, la la okosarong Iesu kimanam ula malusieng ga lemumuriraong irapien a iriro migana na la o sabat.
43009015	Are ratmat ga inagat amarikmeng Parasaiop, “Irapien nuo la inagat mumurum gare mani?” Ga maulo gare ro, “Uabu kimanam ula malusieng na irapien tuo ga tuviet ga puorung meba maset magimarang pagap.”
43009016	Pa non Parasaiop la megama, “Abit ara, iriro migana la tale kan asagaong Morowa ga muo, memani, tale kan ume ouluan maimai o la o lotu.” Pa mirie la megama, “Are mani migana la amaning kirinim la tale kan puoong meba makosarang non ara kaguma onim na panbinim gare tiro?” Ga nekabatmeng ga betliong narain garipien.
43009017	Are ratmat ga amarikmeng iriro migana tinan la sapsapong, “Iriro migana la lemumuriraong irapien nuo, agatnung nuga irie man migana?” Pa upulo iriro migana ties gare ro, “Irie non unuli.”
43009018	Migat, tinan iriro migana la sapsapong pa titot la uibat. Pa Iudaiap la tale nameng meba naganmeng ira. Are ratmat ga marikmeng aime mamo ga naga ang iriro migana la uli ra irapien a.
43009019	Mulio ga lemarikmeng gare ro, “Atabo iriro la poi meng, a? Ga tara la iaria naga irie la sapsapong ara, tiesmang gare tiro? Pa are mani ga inara ui titot?”
43009020	Pa mamo ga naga ang la lipulo ties gare ro, “Ait it, irie poi ing. Pa tara la iaria naga irie la sapsapong ara, are tiro ga ait.
43009021	Pa titot la menava irap a gare mani, tale kan ait. Ga aga la unavan irapien a, irie gat la tale ait. Amarikming: Kakani ra. Puoong meba kan mialava.”
43009022	Mamo ga naga la tiesliong gare ro. Memani, lirau me Iudaiap la meburio ties gare ro, leba tiesang noba gare ro Iesu irie Karisito irie la eba ina malagiang teip ga magaulap am, tie eba akalameng na luguan o usingnualap.
43009023	Irirot i muana ga ties ong mamo ga naga ang iriro migana, ga ligama “Kakani ra. Mumuru le amarikming.”
43009024	Tie lama narain tara la inagat amarikmeng iriro migana tinan la sapsapong. Ga amelo gare ro, “Naving bonim a Morowa. Avet it, iriro migana la tiesnung a, irie migana o ukosar o kirinim.”
43009025	Ga upulo ties gare ro, “Leba irie ba migana o kirinim o karuk, tale arit. Namurit it paga la arit. Tinan la sapsaptung, pa titot la inara uri.”
43009026	Ga inagat amarikmeng gare ro, “Mani la akosarong ira nuo? Unavan irapien nuo gare mani?”
43009027	Ga upulo ties maiong gare ro, “Mirulo ra pa tale iga miomira. Memani ga miga miptang tiestung ma papot ma tarap? Atabo mimi gat la miga mimi ba lop am o usingnualap, a?”
43009028	Ga fugaumeng ira a ga tiesmeng gare ro, “Nunuot kulot ang iriro migana o usingnualap. Pa pava lop am Moses o usingnualap.
43009029	Apet ara, Morowa la ualo ties aun Moses. Pa iriro migana lagum la mavo, tale kan apet.”
43009030	Iriro migana la upulam ga ugama, “Iriro paga o turupnuabap, la tale amit onim lagum, pa lekosarong irapien tuo ga ina uri!
43009031	Abit ara Morowa la tale kan ume upto ties ang migana la ume okosar kirinim. Pa migana la ume lotu me ai Morowa ga ume ouluan agat ang Morowa, tie Morowa la ume upto ties ang.
43009032	Maio tinan ga puoieng titot karuk kan a gas ba a migana ba la sapsapong tara la iaria naga ang, ga tubiat non migana la unavan irapien a.
43009033	La tale asagaong Morowa iriro migana ga muong, tie tala kan puoong meba akosarang paga ba.”
43009034	Mepulo Iudaiap ties ang, “Naga nung la noiat na tavuk o kirinim, ga nunuo migana o kirinim migat! Pa nuga pasingnala, a?” Ga akalameng na luguan o usingnualap ga ula.
43009035	Tie, upto ra Iesu ties a iriro migana la akalameng Iudaiap na luguan o usingnualap, urie teuara ga ula aup iriro migana ga aulo Iesu gare ro, “Nagannung ira Migana migat ang Morowa, o karuk?”
43009036	Pa upulo iriro migana gare ro, “Ila Kakani, iriro Poi ang migana irie aga? Tonalava meba nagantang ira!”
43009037	Ga aulo Iesu, “Agimanung ara. Irirot i migana la man tiesong ga nunuo titot.”
43009038	Ugama iriro migana, “Ila Kakani, nagantung.” Ga lotuong me ai Iesu.
43009039	Pa ugama Iesu, “Muruo na uro kimanam meba avuvurarang tavuk maiang teip ga magaulap. Are ratmat ga inamaniap la sapsapmeng, eba ina umeing. Pa inamaniap la mime umai, eba sapsapmeng.”
43009040	Non Parasaiop la maionama kagarat ai Iesu, la mepto uriro ties. Are ratmat ga amarikmeng, “Nuga tiesnang gare ratmat pava gat la sapsappang, a?”
43009041	Pa maulo Iesu gare ro, “La sapsapmeng irap mi, tie eba tale mimaning kirinim. Pa mime migama, ‘Irap pa la mime umei.’ Are ratmat ga man iot ka kirinim ming.
43010001	“Tie, mirulo migat: Migana la tale uobu na tabuna o busi maiang sipsipup, pa tegoong it bo kudat na non nap ga uobu, migana lare tiro irie migana o pula ga migana o unuranap ma pagap.
43010002	Pa migana la uobu na tabuna, irie migana o unualeap ma sipsipup.
43010003	Migana o unualeap bo tabuna la ume unava tabuna abuo iriro migana. Ga mime mepto sipsipup nanam a. La ume mamarik bop ma sipsipup. Ga ume malagi me lavie.
43010004	Eva, na tara la malagiong ara sipsipup am ganam ga mela lavie, tie ume unum laike ma. Ga man ameuluan, memani, muana la omait nanam a.
43010005	Tale kan mime ameuluan non migana, Karuk. Memani, tale kan omait nanam a. Are ratmat ga igomeng aluo.”
43010006	Iesu la ualo uriro ties o uvuvuo maun, pa tale kan ameit muana o uriro ties.
43010007	Are ratmat ga inagat maulo Iesu gare ro, “Mirulo ra migat, turuo kan tabuna o kudat maiang sipsipup.
43010008	Mirier inamaniap ganam la mumaio laike me rulam, mirie inamaniap o pula ga inamaniap o unuranap ma pagap. Pa tale meptam sipsipup nanamup ma ga mameuluo.
43010009	Tiestung ara, turuo kan tabuna. Man migana la muo toi ga uobu na kudat, eba ina alagiang Morowa. Ga eba obung ga ina ala lavie ga arang parak.
43010010	Memani ga muo migana o pula? Muo meba mavulaang sipsipup ga anamum ga meving ga makiraraang. Pa turuo la karuk. Muruo meba talang ninimiap maun, ga uriro ninimiap la eba dakieng migat mana.
43010011	Turuo migana ila muri o unualeap bo sipsipup. Ga migana ila muri o unualeap bo sipsipup la ume uairo ninimiap ang meba maagaalie sipsipup am.
43010012	Migana la ubiong it me kakep, tale kan irie migana migat o unualeap bo sipsipup ga tale kan irie ira maiang sipsipup. Are ratmat ga tara la agimaong suvaima kavuna la muo, ume urau ga igoong ga maulai sipsipup. Are ratmat ga makaratong suvaima kavuna ga makalaong ga mela tapmat.
43010013	Memani, iriro migana la ubiong it me uniap. Agatong it me neip a. Ga tale kan agatong migat me sipsipup.
43010014	-
43010015	Turuo migana ila muri ounualeap bo sipsipup. Marit maset sipsipup tuam ga maset tomeit, are Morowa Mamo la maset toit ga turuo gat la maset arit. Ga eba taving meba maagaralie sipsipup tuam.
43010016	Misik ka mi non sipsipup tuam, pa tale mirie a gar onim Iudaia. Eba malagirang gat ga talam tapma na gar tuang. Ga eba meptang nanam tuo. Ga tubiat la ebat memaning narit gar ma sipsipup ga narit migana o unuleap maiang.
43010017	Mamo ruang la mitara naong me rulam. Memani, puorung leba talang ninimiap tung ga eba ina tarang gat.
43010018	Karuk kan a noba migana la puoong meba ovugutara ninimiap tung, karuk. Oruluan kan agat tung ga eba talang ninimiap tung. Eva, mating ngangas meba talang ninimiap tung, ga mating ngangas meba ina tarang gat. Mamo ruang la tiesong meba okosartang gare tie.”
43010019	Iudaiap la mepto uriro ties ang Iesu ga nekabatmeng ga narain garipien.
43010020	Papot ma inamaniap la megama, “Muranama ila kire la ut ana iriro migana ga bangutong ara. Are mani ga miga miptang ties ang?”
43010021	Pa mirie la megama, “Karuk kan! Uriro ties la tale ang migana la ame muranama ila kire. Atabo muranama ila kire la puoong meba anavam irap ma teip mila sapsapang, a? Karuk kan!”
43010022	Urie, non lap malonim, ame non la ula babau la kakanu la betieng Ierusalem. Urie, la la avuomeng tara tinan miridaip onim Iudaia la menava tabuna a luguan o lotu maiang teip ga magaulap meba lotumeng ana. Uriro la o sabat la betieng na tara o susugun.
43010023	Tie, man unum Iesu tapma na luguan o lotu bo paranda la meivo bonim a paranda ila kani ang Solomon.
43010024	Are ratmat ga non teip mila kakanim onim Israel la mumaio dusmeng ga akalimeng Iesu. Ga amelo gare ro, “Man tara la eba tiesnang uakap pai nunuo aga migat? Leba nunuo ba Karisito, tie panalava uakap. Nunuo Karisito o karuk?”
43010025	Iesu la upulo ties maiong gare ro, “Mirulora, pa tale iga naganming iro uriro ties. Mirier ubiap ganam la makosartung o bonim a Mamo ruang, miriro la mimelo turuo aga.
43010026	Pa tale kan mimi gar ma sipsipup tuam. Are ratmat ga tale mime nagan ira ruo.
43010027	Marit sipsipup tuam ga mepto nanam tuo ga tomeuluo.
43010028	Ga tualo ninimiap la iot atatan makin maun. Tala kan iomeng, karuk; Ga are gat to, karuk kan a migana ba la puoong meba makalaang na kilan tuo, karuk kan!
43010029	Mamo ruang la ualam toun. Ga irie la kakani me mirier pagap ganam. Are ratmat ga karuk kan a noba migana leba makalaang na kilan a Mamo ruang.
43010030	Turuo ga Mamo la it namurit.”
43010031	Iudaiap la mepto uriro ties ga maiaram tadasip meba avuremeng Iesu ga aving.
43010032	Pa mamarikong Iesu, “Makosartung papot ma kagup onim na panbinim mila mumurum na irap mi, Mamo la ualam. Are ratmat ga naganming me man paga o turupnuabap ga miga tovureming ma tadasip ga tominamung?”
43010033	Megama Iudaiap, “Tale kan agatpang me ubi ula muru la okosarnung ga paga novurevang ma tadasip. Karuk. Paga novurepang memani, fugaunung ira Morowa ga tiesnung nuga kanuna gare Morowa pa nunuot migana agarit.”
43010034	Upulo Iesu ties maiong, “Umir la iotara gare maimai ming: ‘Tiestung ara, mimi morowap?’
43010035	Obit ara babam ula puaru la tale kan puoieng meba pasanieng, karuk. Tinan Morowa la ivam teip ga magaulap la ualo ties ang maun gare, ‘Morowap’.
43010036	Leba are ba tiro, tie mani me iriro migana Morowa Mamo la aiteong ara ga tosagaong ga muruo na uro kimanam? Tugama, ‘Turuo Poi ang Morowa’, pa memani ga bukbukming ga tovureming o ties gare ro, ‘Fugaurung ira Morowa ga tuga tarang nap ang.’
43010037	La tale makosartung mirie ubiap am Mamo ruang, tala kan naganming iro ties tung.
43010038	Pa okosartung ubi ang. Pa leba tale nagan ming iro tiestung, tie naganming irama ubiap la makosartung. Are ratmat ga eba maset omira ga maset naganming: Mamo la unama ira ruo, pa tunama ira Mamo.”
43010039	Are ratmat ga namo ina umaiaring Iudaiap a ga avismeng, pa makabanong ga ula.
43010040	Tie, maulai Iesu ga inar terigiong ga ula na danuot Ioridan ga okoratong uriro danuot ga ula betong na uriro pianam tinan la man uavariam Ioanes teip ga magaulap una. Ga man unama na uriro pianam.
43010041	Papot ma teip ga magaulap la mumaio ai ga megama, “Eva, Ioanes la tale kan akosarong paga ba o turupnuabap. Pa mirier tiesiap am Ioanes la uaramam aime iriro migana migat.”
43010042	Are ratmat ga na iriro nap. Papot ma teip ga magaulap la naganmeng ira Iesu la irie Karisito.
43011001	Urie, non migana bonim a Lasaro la tafaong ga man unama. Iriro migana la irie onim na pianam Betania ga amaning narain laupien la lionama ga irie, Mata ga Maria.
43011002	Maria, urie magabun la aurukieng sada bo kibapien a Ila Kakani ga leba ila kibapien a ma kavurup o. Tie papa liang Lasaro, la tafaong.
43011003	Are ratmat ga loupien angan la osagaliong ties me ai Iesu. Ligama, “Ila Kakani, iriro migana la mitara nanung aime, la tafaong.”
43011004	Upto Iesu uriro ties ga ugama, “Tala kan inamua uriro tafa ga aving. Karuk. Pa eba makosarieng teip ga magaulap ga eba maialang bonim ula kakanu aun Morowa, met iriro paga eba aving Poi ang Morowa bonim a ula kakanu.”
43011005	Eva, mitara naong Iesu me Mata, Maria ga papa liang, Lasaro.
43011006	Pa tara la upto ties a Lasaro la amaning tafa ula kakanu, tale ula kakalait agimaong. Karuk. Pa man unama ka lie narain lapien na uriro pianam la man unama una.
43011007	Ga tubiat la maulo lop o usingnualap, “Ina terigibuong me na provins Iudaia.”
43011008	Megama lop o usingnualap aime, “Migana o usingnualap, tinan it kirat la namo novuremeng Iudaiap ma tadasip, pa nuga gat ina nala na irie nap, a?”
43011009	Upulo Iesu, ties maiong gare ro “Baraba burau me Iudaiap. Atabo karuk kan a 12 o muabari, a? Leba amung migana ba na efan, tala kan ulum. Muana la ogimaong alang o ileng o uro kimanam.
43011010	Pa migana la unum na arubu ume ulum. Memani, tale amaning lalabie meba asingiala o alang.”
43011011	Tiesong gare ro, urie tubiat, inagat maulo, “Migan buang Lasaro la duriong ara. Pa eba rala meba temung.”
43011012	Lop o usingnualap la mepto uriro ties ga amelo Iesu gare ro, “Ila Kakani, leba duriang ebat ina mumuri ba.”
43011013	Pa Iesu la tiesong aime Lasaro la uvara. Pa lop o usingnualap la agatmeng namo ga tiesong ara Iesu aime la duriong it.
43011014	Are ratmat ga tiesong Iesu la uakap mai gare ro, “Lasaro la uvara ra.
43011015	“Pa agattung me milam ga teruba muana la tale tunama ga mirie, meba naganming. Pa titot la eba bula ai.”
43011016	Tomas, meiva Didimas, maulo non lop o usingnualap gare ro, “Tie, bula meba buving ga Ila Kakani.”
43011017	Tie, Iesu ga lop am o usingnualap la mela betmeng kagarat u pianam Betania ga upto Iesu ties gare ro nagala ra ma lap la ut Lasaro na una.
43011018	Betania la iot kagarat u Ierusalem, puieng gare naien kilometavien.
43011019	Ga papot ma Iudaiap la mumaio u Mata ga Maria meba maidangmeng maset dalap lie. Memani, papaliang, la uvara.
43011020	Na tara la ipto Mata ties aime Iesu la unum ga muo, tie teiara ga ila abolaieng. Pa Maria la man ionamat na luguan.
43011021	Muio Mata ga ailo Iesu, “Ila Kakani, la nunama ro, tala kan uvara Lasaro.
43011022	Pa titot gat la tira maset, leba mariknang me ai Morowa me paga ba, tie eba alang Morowa noun.”
43011023	Iesu la oulo Mata, “Eba ina emung papa nuang.”
43011024	Pa ailo Mata, “Arit eba ina teara na iriro tara teip ga magaulap ganam leba ina temaiara na una na tara lagorang.”
43011025	Pa oulo Iesu Mata, “Turuo kan tenuarap ga turuo kan ninimiap. Man migana la naganong ira ruo, la eba aving, eba ina emung.
43011026	Pa mirier teip ga magaulap la maionama ga meinim ga naganmeng me ties tung. Tala kan mevara. Karuk. Eba maionang ga meimung mar mirie lap. Mata, nagannung gare tiro o karuk?”
43011027	Pa ailo Mata Iesu, “Eva, Ila Kakani, nagantung nunuo Karisito. Nunuo Poi ang Morowa, irie la asagaong ga muo na uro kimanam.”
43011028	Mata la tiesieng ara ga Iesu, tie ila omarikieng papa ieng, Maria. Olagieng ga ila na taralap ga oilo tigit Maria. Igama, “Migana o usingnualap isik la muo ra, ga tomarikong nunuo lagum la nunama. Nala agimanang.”
43011029	Maria la ipto uriro ties ga teiara, ga kakalait ila ai Iesu.
43011030	Tale ka betong Iesu na luguan maiang. Unama ka na iriro nap la lake abolaieng Mata.
43011031	Pa Iudaiap la man maionama na luguan ga Maria ga man kadikmeng ga urie. Ogimameng la kakalait teiara ga ila lavie. Ga omeuluo. Agatmeng namo ga er ila iliba na una.
43011032	Tie, ila Maria betieng na iriro nap la unama Iesu ana, ga agimaieng Iesu. Are ratmat ga makofieng dadebip o ai kiban a ga igama, “Ila Kakani, la nunama togo, tala kan uvara papa ruang.”
43011033	Ogimaong Iesu la iliba ga magimaong inamaniap la mumaio ga urie, mirie gat la meliba. Ga dalap a la kadikmeng maset.
43011034	Ga mamarikong, “Lagum la miabua?” Ga amelo, “Ila Kakani munang agimanang.”
43011035	Iesu la uliba.
43011036	Are ratmat ga megama Iudaiap, “Agimaming la uliba. Mitara naong me Lasaro!”
43011037	Pa mirie la megama, “Iriro migana la unavam irap ma inamaniap mila sapsapmeng. Atabo tale kan puoong meba aagaalie iriro migana meba tale aving, a?”
43011038	Tie, upto Iesu uriro ties ga dalap a la kadikmeng maset. Are ratmat ga unum Kagarat ai iriro una. Iriro lu la akosarmeng inamaniap tapma na tadas ila kakani. Ga ame non tadas la mime mialua nanam a iriro lu.
43011039	Ga maulo Iesu, “Avugutmiara iriro tadas.” Pa turupiaba Mata kirat ga ailo Iesu, “Ila Kakani, kiro la eba okosarnang gare tiro. Uvara ga nagala ma lap la aipmeng ara. Are ratmat ga betieng ara isanim ula kiro.”
43011040	Pa oulo Iesu Mata, “Lake la norulo ra, ‘Leba nagannang ira ruo, tie eba agimanang lalabie ila kakani ga ngangas ang Morowa.’”
43011041	Urie, avukutmiara iriro tadas na nanam a iriro una. Ga ui Iesu me nakap na panbinim ga ugama, “Mamo, tivo temaieng me noi. Memani, nupto ra marik tung.
43011042	Norit ara nume busit nupto marik tung. Pa agattung me teip ga magaulap mirogo la dusmeng togo ga tuaramo uriro ties. Memani, meba naganmeng ira nuo la tosaganung ga muruo na uro kimanam na tara la agimameng paga la betong titot.”
43011043	Tiesong gare tiro ga marikong maranit. “Lasaro, tenara ga munang lavie!”
43011044	Urie, talet kagat, iriro migana la uvara la teuara ga muo lavie! Levismeng kilalapien a ga kibapien a a buruma o nuvarap. Ga maialuan gat irapien a a buruma. Are ratmat ga ugama Iesu, “Mila mavikming miriro burap ira a ga miairang meba ala.”
43011045	Urie, papot ma teip ga magaulap onim Iudaia la mumaio kadikmeng ga Maria la agimameng Iesu la akosarong iriro paga, ga naganmeng ira a la irie Karisito.
43011046	Pa non ma mirie la mela mai Parasaiop ga mamelo a iriro paga la akosarong Iesu.
43011047	Are ratmat ga Parasaiop ga miridaip mila kakanim la marikmeng me teip a kaunsel ga mumaio nebolameng ga mamelo gare ro, “Eba mani le akosarbuong, a? Iriro migana la mitara makosarong papot ma kagup onim na panbinim.
43011048	Leba buairang aun iriro tavuk la man akosarong, mirier teip ga magaulap ganam leba naganmeng iro ties ang ga eba ameuluan. Ga tubiat teip o danunumiap onim Rom leba mumaiong ga akirarameng luguan buang o lotu ga mirier garip buam.”
43011049	Pa non migana kabirana ma, bonim a Kaiafas, irie miridai ila uke na urie karanim, la ugama maime, “Tale kan amit paga ba!
43011050	Atabo tale kan amit non tavuk la puoong meba buagaalie. Temaieng let namurit ba migana le aving meba maagaalie teip ga magaulap ganam. Babun mirier garip buam ganam leba ioumeng.”
43011051	Tale kan tiesong gare tiro o agat kan ang. Karuk. Irie miridai na urie karanim. Are ratmat ga tiesong gare unuli me Iesu le aving meba maagaalie teip ga magaulap onim Iudaia.
43011052	Iesu la talet uvara me teip ga magaulap onim Iudaia meba maagaalie. Karuk. Uvara meba apamum mirier teip ga magaulap am Morowa la maionama tapmat ga eba betmeng gare namurit gar.
43011053	Tie, na uriro la, teip mila kakanim la pumaiaro ga meburio ties meba oisinmeng alang ba meba menamung Iesu ga aving.
43011054	Are ratmat ga tale gat ume unum Iesu la uakap kabirana ma Iudaiap. Karuk. Oulai uriro pianam ga ula unama kagarat u pianam la karuk ma inamaniap, na non taun la meivo bonim o Epraim. Ga man unama na uriro taun ga lop am o usingnualap.
43011055	Uriro la ula babau o ula aipieng maiong Iudaiap kagarat ara la namo betieng. Are ratmat ga papot teip ga magaulap onim na pialap tapmat la mela na taun Ierusalem meba tebabaurameng kan lake me la ula babau.
43011056	Ga namo aisinmeng Iesu. Man dusmeng tapma na luguan o lotu ga man nemarikmeng kabirana ma kan gare ro, “Agatbuong gare mani? Atabo eba muong ogimaang la ula babau o ula aipieng o karuk?”
43011057	Pa Miridaip mila kakanim ga Parasaiop la mamelo teip ga magaulap gare ro, “Migana ba la ait Iesu la unama lagum, tie, tiesnang meba uparing a ga avispang.”
43012001	Tie, gunamur ma lap la maiot ka, ga lap mila kakanim o lotu leba betmeng. Na irie tara, Iesu la ula Betania, pianam ang Lasaro, iriro migana la imua Iesu na una.
43012002	Okosarmeng parak meba teaba Iesu na urio pianam. Pa Mata la man iava iouna o parak, pa Lasaro la man unama kabirana ma inamaniap la parakmeng ga Iesu.
43012003	Na iriro tara Maria la iara nap a kilo a sanda ila maiaba kakepup a, ga muio maikinieng kibap a Iesu. Urie, teiara ga lebaila kibapien a ma kavurup o bugam o kan. Ga uriro kukuf ula mamaguieng a sanda la dakieng na luguan gane.
43012004	Pa non kulot ang o usingnualap, bonim a Iudas onim na pianam Iskariot, iriro migana tubiat leba abung Iesu na kilalap ma karorap am, irie kan la tiesong gare.
43012005	“Kuot! Memani ga igamariro uriro magabun? Mumuru le buarang iriro sanda ga bualang maun noba inamaniap meba asaumeng ga buaram kakepup gare 1,500 ma Kinap ga bualam maun teip mila baim!”
43012006	Migat, Iudas la tale kan agatong me teip mila baim ga tiesong gare tiro. Karuk. Irie migana o pula. Amaning ubi la ume uale bo mirikbuom ma kakepup am Iesu ga lop am o usingnualap, pa irie kan la ume mapula non kakepup la maiot ana.
43012007	Pa ugama Iesu, “Nairang uriro magabun. Le iaring iriro sanda puoieng, na uriro la leba taving ga tomemung.
43012008	Teip ga magaulap la tale memanim kakepup eba man maionang busit kabirana mi. Pa turuo la tala kan tunama ga mimi busit.”
43012009	Urie, tara la unama Iesu Betania, papot ma teip ga magaulap onim Iudaia la ameit Iesu. Are ratmat ga mumaio meba agimameng Iesu. Pa talet mumaio meba agimameng Iesu. Karuk. Mepto ties a Iesu la ina imua Lasaro na una ga mumaio meba agimameng.
43012010	Are ratmat ga miridaip mila kakanim la meburio ties meba gat menamung Lasaro ga aving.
43012011	Memani, papot ma teip ga magaulap onim Iudaia la naganmeng me paga la akosarong Iesu ira Lasaro. Ga mamaiolai miridaip mila kakanim ga naganmeng ira Iesu.
43012012	Urie, na la tubiat gar ila kakani ma teip ga magaulap la mumaio ra Ierusalem meba ogimameng uriro la ula babau la ula aipieng ga, mepta gat ait aime Iesu la namo muong na taun Ierusalem.
43012013	Are ratmat ga maiaram muraip ma kuop pam ga mela abolameng na alang. Ga man kukupmeng gare ro, “Tenubap me ai Morowa! Eva, Morowa le aidangang maset iriro migana la muo na bonim a Ila Kakani. Irie Orong iang Israel.” Sam 118:25-26
43012014	Pa uara Iesu non donki ila kubama ga unama abuo. Are ties la iot na babam ang unuli Sekaria la omirong:
43012015	“Mimi teip ga magaulap onim na taun Ierusalem! Baraba mirau. Agimaming. Orong ming la muo ra titot. Unama bo donki ila kubama ga muo.” Sekaraia 9:9
43012016	Lop am o usingnualap la tale ka ameit muana a iriro paga. Pa tubiat la imua Morowa Iesu na una ga ina oula Iesu lalabie ang ula kakanu na panbinim, na irie tara la ina oagatmeng babam ula puaru la tiesieng gare tiro aime. Ga ina agatmeng iriro paga la akosarmeng inamaniap ira a.
43012017	Tara la uvara Lasaro ga ut na una, papot ma teip ga magaulap la maionama ga Iesu. Are ratmat ga agimameng la amarikong Lasaro ga teuara na una. Titot miriro teip ga magaulap la man baismeng a iriro paga la akosarong Iesu.
43012018	Are ratmat ga teip ga magaulap la mepto ties aime Iesu la akosarong iriro paga o turupnuabap ga mela abolameng na alang.
43012019	Pa man tiesmeng Parasaiop kabirana ma gare ro, “Titot la ogimabuong ubi buong la tale puoieng. Teip ga magaulap la mela ga ameuluan.”
43012020	Urie, kabirana ma garip ma teip ga magaulap la mumaio na taun Ierusalem na uriro la ula babau la ula aipieng meba okosarmeng lotu me ai Morowa. Non Grikip gat la mumaio.
43012021	Tie, miriro Grikip la mumaio ai Filip iriro migana onim na taun Betasaida na provins Galili. Ga amarikmeng gare ro, “Migana ila kakani, paga agimapang Iesu.”
43012022	Tie, Filip la ula aulo Andrias. Are ratmat ga lila alilo Iesu la namo agimameng Grikip.
43012023	Pa upulo Iesu uriro umarikliong ga leulo gare ro, “Tara ruang Migana migat ang Morowa la namo arang bonim ula kakanu, la betong ara titot.
43012024	Mirulo, migat. Leba noba kabo a wit leba tale ilaming na kimanam ga iving, tie ebat urie ba talamet leba iot. Pa leba iving, tie eba siksikieng ga iaring papot o parak.
43012025	Leba naang migana ba me ninimiap ang kan, ninimiap ang la eba karuk ba ume. Pa leba migana ba la ualo ibunam a iro ninimiap ang na uro kimanam, eba aring ninimiap la iot atatan makin.
43012026	Leba okosarang migana ba ubi rung, mumuru le toauluo. Ga pianam la tunama una, migana ruang o ubi gat, eba onang ga turuo una. Leba okosarang migana ba ubi rung, tie eba alang Mamo ruang bonim ula kakanu aun.”
43012027	“Titot la giginam dalap tuo ga mitara agattung papot. Ga eba mani le taramang, a? Atabo eba tiestang gare ro, Mamo, avugutnara iriro paga la namo betang ira ruo titot? Karuk. Tala kan tiestung gare tie. Iriro tara o giginanim leba betang ira ruo. Irirot i muana ga muruo na uro kimanam.”
43012028	“Mamo, okosarnang bonim nuo meba kakanu ba.” Tiesong Iesu gare tiro, pa non ties la maio nakap na panbinim la tiesieng gare ro, “Okosartung ara bonim tuo ga kakanu ga eba gat ina okosartang ga kakanu ba maset.”
43012029	Teip ga magaulap la dusmeng kagarat, la mepto uriro ties, ga turupmaiaba kirat ga megama, “Non duk la ilo.” Pa mirie la megama, “Non angelo isik la tiesong.”
43012030	Upulo Iesu ties ga ugama, “Uriro ties la tale betieng meba toagailie. Karuk. Betieng meba miagailie.
43012031	Titot eba avuvuoang Morowa tavuk maiang teip ga magaulap onim na uro kimanam; titot eba akalaang migana ila uke, Satan la uale bo uro kimanam.
43012032	Titot la tunama na kimanam, pa tubiat eba tomaiaving me nakap. Na iriro tara eba taranam mirier teip ga magaulap ganam ga mumaiong toi.”
43012033	Uaramo Iesu uriro ties la masinguala a man tavuk leba aving ana; iro maiogun.
43012034	Papot ma teip ga magaulap la mepulo ties ang gare ro, “Papto ties gare ro na maimai; Karisito leba emung ga pareang. Pa are mani ga tiesnung, eba maiaving Poi ang migana? Iriro Migana migat ang Morowa irie aga?”
43012035	Tie, maulo Iesu gare ro, “Tatak it tara lalabie la unama ka ga mimi. Ga mimaning ka lalabie, gare ratmat ga mimung na lalabie. Ebun miialu arubu. Migana la unum na arubu, tale teit maset ula lagum.
43012036	Titot mimaning ka lalabie, are ratmat ga naganming ira lalabie, meba mimi ba lop iam lalabie.” Iesu la uaramam ara miriro tiesiap ga maulai ga kagouri maime.
43012037	Eva, agimameng la makosarong papot ma kagup onim na panbinim, pa tale kan naganmeng ira a. Karuk.
43012038	Are ratmat ga ties ang unuli Aisaia la iario parak. Ugama, “Ila Kakani, aga la upto bais pang? Eva, Ila Kakani, eba osingnala ngangas nung aun aga?” Aisaia 53:1
43012039	Are ratmat ga tale kan puomeng meba naganmeng ira Iesu. Unuli Aisaia la umirong me muana a iriro paga pa non nap o uriro babam ang. La igama,
43012040	“Morowa la masapsapong ara irap ma, ga makosarong dalap ma ga libonmeng. Babun magimameng irap ma noba pagap ga dalap ma leba mameira muap ma noba tiesiap, ga eba marigimeng dalap ga ina mumaiong toi, ga eba ina mamumurirarang.” Aisaia 6:10
43012041	Aisaia la ogimaong lalabie ga ngangas ula kakanu ang Iesu ga uaramo uriro ties aime Iesu.
43012042	Migat, papot ma teip mila uke gat la naganmeng ira a. Pa merau me Parasaiop ga tale maiaramo la uakap nagan maiong. Agatmeng, babun makalameng na luguan o usingnualap.
43012043	Memani, nameng me uvien ma bop maun teip ga magaulap. Pa tale nameng meba mavienang Morowa bop ma.
43012044	Pa tiesong maranit Iesu ga ugama, “Man migana la naganong ira ruo, talet naganong ira ruo. Karuk. Naganong gat ira Mamo, irie la tosagaong ga muruo na uro kimanam.
43012045	Man migana la togimaong, irie la agimaong gat Mamo irie la tosagaong ga muruo togo.
43012046	Muruo na uro kimanam gare lalabie. Are ratmat ga migana la naganong ira ruo, irie la tala kan unama na arubu.
43012047	Man migana la upto ties tung ga tale omeuluan, tie tala kan mavuvorung gare ias. Tale kan muruo meba tonang ga mavuvorang teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam. Karuk. Muruo meba ina malagirang.
43012048	Pa man migana la ualo ibunam a ira ruo ga tale upto ties tung, amaning ias meba avuvuoang. Ties la tuaramo urie leba avuvuoieng iriro migana na la lagorang.
43012049	Memani, tale kan tuaramo ties o agat tung kan. Karuk. Mamo la tosagaong ga muruo to, irie kan la toulo ma mirie tiesiap ganam meba taramam.
43012050	Ga orit, ties ang Mamo la ime ovaik ninimiap la iot atatan makin. Are ratmat ga mirier tiesiap ganam la tume tuaramam, tume makosar gare tie la toulo Mamo.”
43013001	Tie, la ula babau o la o Pasova la tale ka betieng. Ga ait Iesu, tara la betong ara meba oolaing urio kimanam ga ina ala ai Mamo na panbinim. Mitara mabouvara teip ga magaulap am la maionama na uro kimanam. Ga mabouvara poieng la uvara.
43013002	Nabit, Iesu ga lop am o usingnualap la man maionama ga parakmeng. Pa Satan la uabura agat ang na dalap a Iudas poi ang Simon Iskariot, meba abung Iesu na kilalap ma karorap am.
43013003	Iesu la oit ara gare ro, Mamo la ualam ara mirie pagap na kilan a. Ait kan Morowa la asagaong ga muo, ga eba gat ina ala ai Morowa.
43013004	Are ratmat ga teuara ga aulai luaga o parak, ga unio sasa ang ula laklago, ga uaro non taul ga ovisong ira karima a.
43013005	Tie, ourukong burunam na non dis ga okosarong ubi ula papalu la ume okosar migana o ubi. Eva, puaro la magosong kibap ma lop o usingnualap ga mabaula a taul o tebanulap urie la ovisong ira karima a.
43013006	Tie, okosarong gare tiro puoieng la muo ai Simon Petro. Ga ugama Petro, “Ila Kakani, atabo nuga akosarnang tavuk ang migana o ubi agarit ga legosnang kibapien tuo gat, a?”
43013007	Upulo Iesu ties ang ga ugama, “Paga la akosartung ira nuo titot, irie la tale kan anit. Pa tubiat ga eba anera.”
43013008	Petro la ugama, “Ila Kakani, buat magosnung kibap tuo. Tala kan!” Iesu la upulo ties ang, “Petro, leba tale nogostang, tie tala kan nunuo migana ruang o usingnualap.”
43013009	Simon Petro la upto uriro ties ang Iesu ga turupuaba kirat ga ugama, “Ila Kakani, leba are ba rie, barabat agosnung it kiban tuo. Karuk. Pa legosnang gat kilalapien tuo ga bugam tuo!”
43013010	Iesu la ugama, “Petro, migana la uviet ara tala gat ina uviet. Agosang it kiban a ga eba babai ba gane. Eva, mibabaim ara. Pa tale tiestung me mimir ganam.”
43013011	Iesu la ait ara iriro migana Iudas la namo abung na kilalap ma karorap. Are ratmat ga ugama, “Tale kan mimi ganam la mibabaum.”
43013012	Urie, magosong ara Iesu kibap ma lop o usingnualap, ga ina uabua sasa ang ila laklage ga unama. Ga mamarikong gare ro, “Atabo amit muana a iriro paga la akosartung ira mi?
43013013	Mime tomiva migana o usingnualap o Ila Kakani. Ga mumuru la tomiva gare rie.
43013014	Turuo Ila Kakani ga migana o usingnualap ming, la magostung kibap mi. Are ratmat ga mimi gat le magosming kibap ma teip ga magaulap a non gar buang.
43013015	Misingtuala ra a iriro tavuk, ga mimi gat le akosarming iriet tavuk gare titot la akosartung ira mi.
43013016	Mirulo migat: Migana o ubi la tale kan kakani me ila kakani ang. Ga migana o usaga la tale kan kakani me migana la asagaong ga ula.
43013017	Titot la amit ara muana o uriro agat ga tavuk la akosartung, pa leba amiuluan maset, tie Morowa leba milaminaisang.
43013018	Tale kan tiestung me mimir ganam. Mirit mimi teip la miterung mimi tuam, ga omit ties la iot na babam ang Morowa, la eba betieng migat. Uriro ties la igama, “Migana la u purun ga turuo, uavia kiban a me nakap meba tobutang ga tokiraraang.”
43013019	Iriro paga la tale ka betong, pa titot la mirulo. Are ratmat ga tubiat, na tara leba betang, iriro leba miigorala ga eba naganming gare ro, “Turuo iriro Karisito.”
43013020	Mirulo migat: Migana la alagiong migana o ubi la asagarung ga ula, ga aidangong maset, iriro migana la tolagiong ga maset toidangong. Pa migana o magabun la tolagiong, irire la alagiong Mamo irie la tosagaong ga muruo.”
43013021	Tie, Iesu la tiesong gare ro ga mitara giginam dalap a. Ga tiesong ga ugama, “Mirulo migat: Non kabirana mi leba toala maun inamaniap la nekaromela ga turuo.”
43013022	Tiesong gare tiro pa negimameng lop o usingnualap. Pa tale ameit, tiesong me aga.
43013023	Non kulot o usingnualap ang Iesu la ume na maset aime, la unama kagarat ai Iesu ga uabu bugam a ira aroma a.
43013024	Are ratmat ga oritigiong Simon Petro bugam a ga aulo, “Amariknang, tiesong me aga.”
43013025	Tie, iriro kulot o usingnualap la uabu bugam a ira aroma a Iesu la amarikong gare ro, “Ila Kakani, tiesnung me aga?”
43013026	Iesu la upulo ties gare ro, “Eba tarang nap o purun ga tabung na sup ga talang aun non migana. Irirot i migana la tiestung aime.” Tie uabu nap o parak na sup ga ualo aun Iudas Iskariot poi ang Simon.
43013027	Tara la uaro Iudas uriro purun uobur Satan na dalap a. Are ratmat ga aulo Iesu, “Paga la nuga akosarnang, tie akosarnang it Kakalait!”
43013028	Mirier lop ganam o usingnualap la maionama bo luaga la mepto uriro ties la uaramo Iesu aime Iudas, pa tale ameit muana o uriro ties.
43013029	Ume uale Iudas bo mirikbuom ma kakepup, are ratmat ga non kabirana ma la agatmeng namo ga aulor Iesu meba ala masauang pagap me uriro la ula babau o la ula aipieng, o meba ala alam pagap ba maun teip ga magaulap la karuk ma pagap ba maiam.
43013030	Iudas la uaror uriro nap o parak, tie talet kagart ga ula lavie. Ga betieng ara arubu.
43013031	Urie, iura ra Iudas me lavie, tie ugama Iesu, “Titot turuo Migana migat ang Morowa la tuaro bonim ula kakanu. Ga uaro Morowa bonim ula kakanu ira ruo Migana migat ang Morowa.
43013032	Pa tara la uaro Morowa bonim ula kakanu ira ruo, tie Morowa kan leba alang bonim ula kakanu toun, Migana migat ang Morowa, ga ebat akosarang Morowa iriro paga kakalait.
43013033	Lop tuam, tatak it tara la eba tonang ka ga mimi. Ga eba man toisinming. Pa marulo Iudaiap, aret tiro la mirulo: Tale kan puoming meba mila na pianam la tula una.
43013034	Pa titot la tualo maimai ula nou miun. La are ro: Mimi ut narit narit le naming migat me non teip. Narung migat me milam, aret tie le naming migat me non teip.
43013035	Leba mimi ba ut narit narit leba naming migat me non teip na gar tuang, tie irirot le masingala teip ga magaulap na uro kimanam gare ro, mimi lop tuam o usingnualap.”
43013036	Tie, Simon Petro la amarikong Iesu gare ro, “Ila Kakani, eba nala lagum?” Pa upulo Iesu, “Pianam leba tala una, titot tale kan puonung meba tonouluan ga nala una. Pa tubiat la eba tonouluan ga munang.”
43013037	Pa amarikong Petro, “Ila Kakani, Memani ga tale kan puorung meba noruluan titot? Eba talang ninimiap tung meba noagaralie.”
43013038	Iesu la upulo ties ang, “Nuga nagannung puonung leba nalang ninimiap nung meba toaganalie. Norulo migat: Tara leba ka tale kukurikang pura, eba tiesnang ma naien ma tarap gare ro, ‘Tale kan arit iriro migana.’”
43014001	Tie, Iesu la inagat tiesong me lop o usingnualap gare ro, “Baraba giginam dalap mi ga agatming papot. Naganming ira Morowa ga naganming gat ira ruo.
43014002	Na luguan ang Mamo ruang ame papot ma kabilip. La karuk, tie eba tale miralava. Eba rala ga eba orangarang pianam ming.
43014003	Ga leba rala orangarang pianam ming, tie eba ina terigirang ga milagirang me toi, meba gat mimi ba le mionang na urie pianam la tunama una.
43014004	Omit ara uriro alang la ila na pianam la tunama una.”
43014005	Tie, Tomas la aulo Iesu, “Ila Kakani, tale kan opet eba nala lagum. Are mani ga puovang meba opera uriro alang? Tale kan puovang.”
43014006	Iesu la upulo uriro umarik gare ro, “Turuo kan alang, ga turuo muana o ties migat, ga turuo muana o ninimiap. Karuk kan a noba migana leba muong ai Mamo na noba alang. Karuk. Ira ruot.
43014007	La tomit ara migat, tie puoming meba amira Mamo ruang gat. Titot pumiaro la amit ara ga agimaming ara.”
43014008	Filip la ugama aime Iesu, “Ila Kakani, pasingnala a Mamo nuang ga eba puoieng ira pa.”
43014009	Iesu la aulo, “Filip, laklager a tara la tunama ga mimi. Pa tale ka tomit turuo aga, a? Migana la togimaong, agimaong ara Mamo ruang gat. Tie, are mani ga nugama, ‘pasingnala a Mamo nuang?’
43014010	Atabo tale kan nagannung la tunama ira Mamo ruang, pa unama Mamo ruang ira ruo? Tiesiap la tualam miun, mirie la tale kan makosartung o agat kan tung. Mamo la unama ira ruo, irie la ume makosar ubiap am kan.
43014011	Oagatming ara uriro ties: Tunama ira Mamo ruang, pa Mamo ruang la unama ira ruo. La karuk, tie naganming irama mirier ubiap la makosartung ga naganming ira ruo me miriro ubiap.
43014012	Mirulo migat: Man migana la naganong ira ruo, eba gat makosarang mirie ubiap la tume makosartung. Eva, eba makosarang ubiap mila kakanim maset me mirie la makosartung. Memani, eba rala ai Mamo ruang.
43014013	Ga eba makosartang mirier pagap ganam la amarikming Morowa Mamo na bonim tuo. Are ratmat ga eba arang Mamo bonim ula kakanu ira ruo Poi ang.
43014014	Eva, mirier pagap leba mamarikming na bonim tuo, eba makosartang.”
43014015	Tie, Iesu la tiesong gare ro, “Leba naming migat me rulam, tie eba maset mamiuluan maimaiap tuam la tualam miun.
43014016	Ga eba amariktang Mamo meba alang miun non ara aganuliap meba miagaalie ga mingangasang. Ga eba man onang ga mimi mar mirie lap ganam.
43014017	Iriro la muranama o ties migat. Teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam la tale puomeng meba amela. Memani, tale kan agimameng ga tale ameit. Pa mimi la amit. Memani, irie la unama ga mimi ga eba onang tapma na dalap mi.
43014018	Tale kan puorung meba mirolaing ga mirairang meba mionang agarit. Gare ba lop la tale memaning irap ga nagap. Karuk. Eba ina terigirang me mi.
43014019	Tubiat it teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam la tale kan puomeng meba ina togimameng gat. Pa mimi la eba togimaming. Memani, eba ina terara na nuvarap ga temung. Ga mimi gat leba ina temiara na nuvarap ga mimung.
43014020	Na uriro la Muranama Ila Babai leba muong mi, ga eba mira, tunama ai Mamo ruang ga mionama ira ruo pa tunama ira mi.
43014021	Man migana la oula maimai rung ga ouluan maset, iriro migana la naong maset me rulam. Ga man migana la naong me rulam, Mamo ruang leba onang gat ai. Ga turuo gat leba narang aime, ga eba tevaiktang kan ai.”
43014022	Iudas tale onim Iskariot la ugama aime, “Pa Ila Kakani, are mani ga eba tevaiknang na irap pa, pa tale iga tevaiknang na irap ma teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam?”
43014023	Iesu la aulo Iudas gare ro, “Migana la naong me rulam migat, eba maset oauluo ties tung. Ga eba naang Mamo ruang aime, eba muiong ai. Ga ira ruang ga turuo la eba ionang ira a.
43014024	Migana la tale maset naong me rulam, eba tale ouluan maset ties tung. Uriro ties la mipto, tale ties tung kan. Karuk. Ties ang Mamo irie la tosagaong ga muruo na uro kimanam.”
43014025	“Tara la tunama ka ga mimi, mirulo ma mirio pagap.
43014026	Pa aganuliap ming migat meba mingangasang, irie Muranama Ila Babai. Eba asagaang Mamo ga muong na bonim tuo. Eba betang ga misingala ma mirier pagap ganam. Ga are gat to eba mavavarangas ang agarip mim ga eba ina magatming mirier tiesiap ganam la tualam miun.
43014027	Tuga mirolaing, mivuorung a malina; tuala malina tuang miun; tale kan migamti gare teip ga magaulap onim na uro kimanam la mime dakamai. Are ratmat ga baraba giginam dalap mi ga agatming papot, ga baraba mirau.
43014028	Mipto ra uriro ties la tualo miun: Eba mirolaing ga tala ga eba ina murang mi. Leba naming migat me rulam, temiba togo leba rala ai Mamo. Memani, Mamo la kakani migat me rulam.
43014029	Iriro paga la tale ka betong pa titot la mirulo ra. Memani, tubiat tara leba agimaming iriro la eba betang, eba naganming turuo Karisito.
43014030	Tala gat tiestung papot ga mimi. Memani, iriro migana ila uke la uale bo urogo kimanam la namor muong titot. Tale kan amaning kukunim meba akosarang paga ba ira ruo.
43014031	Pa narung me teip ga magaulap onim na uro kimanam le ameira, mitara narung me Mamo ga makosartung it mirier pagap ganam gare Mamo la toulo. Tebuara ga obulaing uriro pianam ga bula.”
43015001	Tie, Iesu la tiesong gare ro, “Turuo kan kuguom a wain migat. Pa Mamo ruang la irie Mamo iang uriro ubi a wain.
43015002	Mirier muareip ira ruo la tale mime lopmaiat, Mamo la ume mavugutuara. Mirier muareip la mime lopmaiat, ume maraga babap ma mila kiram ga makosarong muareip meba babaim ba, meba lopmaiaring muareip maset.
43015003	Mibabaim ara. Memani, o uriro ties la tualo miun, uriro la mikosarieng ga mibabaim.
43015004	Parepming ira ruo, ga eba pareptang ira mi. Leba tale parepieng muaranim o kuguom a wain iro kuguom, tie tala kan iario parak urie kan. Aret tie ga leba tale pareming ira ruo, tala kan puoming meba miaring parak.
43015005	Turuo kan kuguom a wain, pa mimi gare muareip tuo. Parepming ira ruo ga eba pareptang ira mi, ga eba miaring papot parak. Pa leba tomiolaing, tale kan puoming meba akosarming paga ba.
43015006	Migana la tale parepong ira ruo, tie eba akomeng gare muaranim o kuguom, ga eba laluo ba. Ga mime mepamuam miriro muareip ga mime mago na kit ga suammeng.
43015007	Leba parepming ira ruo ga ties tung gat la iot na dalap mi, tie eba marikming a man paga la naming aime, ga eba alang Morowa irie paga miun.
43015008	Mumuru le miaring papot parak meba mionang mimi lop tuam o usingnualap. Met iriro tavuk Mamo ruang leba arang bonim ula kakanu.
43015009	Mamo la mitara naong me rulam ga nat iriro tavuk la narung me milam. Tie man mionang it busit tapma na ubonuvarap tung.
43015010	Leba omiuluo maset maimai rung, tie eba mionang una ubonuvarap tung. Are tie la oruluan maset maimai ang Mamo ruang, ga tunama una ubonuvarap ang.
43015011	Narung me tenubap tung le iot miun ga uriro tenubap la dakieng na dalap mi. Are ratmat ga tuaramo uriro ties mi.
43015012	“Tie, maimai rung la are ro: Mimi ut narit narit le naming maset me non ara, are turuo la narung me milam.
43015013	Karuk kan o ubonuvarap ba ang noba la kakanu me ira noba la ualo ninimiap ang me migap am.
43015014	Mimi migap tuam, leba makosarming mirier pagap la mirulo ma. Tie eba mimi ba papap tuam.
43015015	Migana o ubi la tale mait pagap migana ang ila kakani la ume makosar. Are ratmat ga tale gat miriva teip o ubi. Karuk. Mirier tiesiap la tume tuptam aun Mamo ruang la tume mirulo ma. Are ratmat ga miriva papap tuam.
43015016	Tale kan toiteming meba tonang ga mimi. Karuk. Turuo kan la miterung meba mimi ba gar tuang. Ga miterung me ubi, meba mila ga miaring parak, meba iot maset. Are ratmat ga na bonim tuo leba marikming me ai Mamo meba alang noba paga miun, tie eba alang.
43015017	Are ratmat ga tualo maimai miun gare ro, “Mimi ut narit narit le naming migat me non ara.
43015018	“Tie, teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam leba nekaromela ga mimi, agatming it na dalap mi gare ro: Lake nekaromela ga turuo.
43015019	Leba mionang gare teip ga magaulap onim na uro kimanam, tie teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam la eba nameng me milam gare gar kan maiang. Pa tale mimi teip gare mirie. Karuk. Miterung ara meba amiolaing tavuk onim na urogo kimanam. Are ratmat ga teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam leba nekaromela ga mimi.
43015020	Oagatming maset uriro ties la tuaramo mi. Migana o ubi la tale kan akurupin migana ang Ila Kakani. Lake tokirarameng. Are ratmat ga eba gat mikirarameng. Leba meptang ties tung ga omeuluan. Tie, eba gat meptang ties ming ga omeuluo.
43015021	Memani, tale kan ameit Mamo, irie la tosagaong ga muruo na uro kimanam. Pa mimi la gar tuang. Are ratmat ga eba makosarmeng miriro tavukup mila kiram ganam ira mi.
43015022	La tale muruo na uriro kimanam ga talang ties ang Mamo maun, tie eba tale memaning kirinim. Pa titot la tale memaning alang meba mereing kirinim maiong.
43015023	Man migana la nekaroula ga turuo, eba gat nekaroala ga Mamo ruang.
43015024	La tale tunama kabirana ma ga makosartang miriro ubiap mila kakanim la karuk a noba migana la makosarong tinan, tie eba tale memaning kirinim. Pa magimameng ara miriro ubiap tuam ga nekaromelat agarit ga turuo ga Mamo ruang gat.
43015025	Iriro tavuk la akosarmeng la betong meba ovuomeng non ties la iot na babam o maimai maiong. Uriro ties la igama: ‘Nekaromelat agarit ga turuo.’
43015026	Pa Muranama meba mingangasang la unama ga Mamo ga eba asagarang ga muong mi. Irie Muranama o ties migat, la eba muong ai Mamo. Eva, na tara leba muong eba, bais ang la uakap o ties tung ga ubi rung.
43015027	Ga mimi gat le baisming o ties tung. Memani, mimi gat la mionama ga turuo na tara la puruaro ubi, ga muio puoieng titot.
43016001	“Tale narung meba milaming ga omiolaing nagan ming. Are ratmat ga tuaramo uriro ties me miun.
43016002	Eba mibunakmeng meba tale mumiong na luguan o usingnualap. Ga tubiat leba betang tara, tie eba mimenamung ga miving. Eba agatmeng namo ga okosarmeng ara ubi ula mumuru ang Morowa.
43016003	Tale ameit Mamo ga tale tomait gat. Are ratmat ga eba makosarmeng miriro pagap.
43016004	Titot la mirulor ma miriro pagap leba betmeng. Are ratmat ga tubiat, na tara leba akosarmeng inamaniap iriro tavuk ira mi, tie eba oagatming uriro ties la mirulo. Tinan kan la tale mirulo ma miriro pagap, memani tunama ga mimi.
43016005	“Pa titot er tala ai Mamo, irie la tosagaong ga muruo. Pa karuk kan a noba mi la tomarikong, ‘Er nala lagum?’
43016006	Pa titot dalap mi la mitara giginam. Memani, tuaramo uriro ties mi.
43016007	Pa mirulo migat. Eba mirolaing ga tala meba miagaralie. Memani, leba tale tala, tie Muranama meba mingangasang la tala kan muo mi. Pa tara leba tala, tie eba asagarang ga muong mi.
43016008	Na tara la muo, eba makosarang teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam meba ameira migat muana o kirinim la okosarmeng. Ga eba masingala ga ameuluan tavuk ila puvuvui, ga a muana o dus na ties ang Morowa.
43016009	Muana o kirinim la are ro: Tale kan naganmeng ira ruo, turuo Karisito.
43016010	Muana a tavuk ila puvuvui la are ro: Tala ai Mamo. Ga tala gat puoming meba togimaming.
43016011	Muana o dus na ties la are ro: Iriro migana ila uke onim na kimanam. Satan, la uabuara Morowa na ties.
43016012	Matim papot tiesiap la tuga talam miun pa tale urangaming meba miptam ga miaram titot.
43016013	Pa tara leba muong Muranama o ties migat, eba ake me agarip mim ga eba mamira mirier tiesiap migat. Tala kan uaramam tiesiap ot agat ang kan. Karuk. Mirier tiesiap la uptam, miriet leba aramam. Ga eba mialava ma pagap leba betmeng tubiat.
43016014	Eba arang ties tung ga aramang mi, met iriro tavuk ga eba alang bonim ula kakanu toun
43016015	Mirier pagap am Mamo la tuam. Are ratmat ga tiestung. Eba arang Muranama ties tung ga aramang mi.
43016016	“Tatak it tara ga tala gat ina togimaming. Pa tubiat kirat ga eba ina togimaming.”
43016017	Non ma lop o usingnualap la nemarikmeng kabirana ma kan gare ro, “Man muana o uriro ties la uaramo bui? Ugama, ‘Tatak it tara ga eba tale togimaming, pa tubiat it kirat ga eba togimaming?’ Ga are gat to la ugama muana a iriro gare ro, ‘Erala ai Mamo.’”
43016018	Man nemarikmeng, “Iriro ‘Tatak it tara’ la tiesong aime, irie man paga? Tale kan abit muana o uriro ties la uaramo.”
43016019	Iesu la mait la memaning agat ula kakanu la namo amarikmeng a iriro paga. Are ratmat ga ugama, “Atabo man nemarikming tapmat a muana o uriro ties la tuaramo, a? Tiestung gare ro, ‘Tatak it tara ga tala gat ina togimaming. Pa tubiat it kirat ga eba ina togimaming.’
43016020	Mirulo migat: Teip ga magaulap onim na kimanam leba temeba me miriro pagap leba betmeng. Pa mimi la eba miliba maranit ga eba miliba o kadik. Eva, eba ogasangenming giginanim ula kakanu na dalap mi. Pa dalap mi mila giginam leba terigimeng ga betieng tebubap ula kakanu maset.
43016021	Magabun la namo iaring kulot, la ait tara iang la betong ara. Are ratmat ga ogasangenieng ngitngit ula kakanu. Pa tara la iariar kulot, tale gat agatieng me uriro ngitngit. Karuk. Teibat me kulot la betong ara na kimanam.
43016022	Aret tiro, titot la giginam dalap mi. Pa tubiat leba ina migimarang gat, tie eba ina temeba dalap mi. Ga karuk kan a migana ba la puoong meba ovugutara uriro tenubap ming.
43016023	Na irie tara, eba tale tomarikming a paga ba. Mirulo migat: Leba amarikming Mamo a paga ba na bonim tuo, tie eba alang miun.
43016024	Tinan la tale kan amarikming a paga ba na bonim tuo. Pa titot amarikming, ga eba miarang. Are ratmat ga eba dakmeng dalap mi o tenubap.
43016025	“Tuaramam miriro tiesiap o ties o uvuvuo. Tubiat tala gat tuaramam tiesiap o uvuvuo mi. Karuk. Eba tiestang la uakap ga miralava a Mamo.
43016026	Na irie tara tubiat, eba amarikming na bonim tuo. Pa tale tiestung meba amariktang Mamo meba miagaralie. Karuk.
43016027	Memani, Mamo kan la naong me milam, ga eba miagaralie. Eva, naong me milam muana la naming me rulam ga naganming ara la tunama ga Mamo ga tosagaong ga muruo na uriro kimanam.
43016028	Tinan la tunama ga Mamo ga arulai ga muruo na uriro kimanam. Pa titot la tuga orolaing uro kimanam ga ina tala ai Mamo.”
43016029	Tie lop am o usingnualap la tiesmeng gare ro, “Eva, titot tiesnung la uakap. Titot la tale kan ties nung o uvuvuo.
43016030	Titot la opet, manit ara umarikip la maiot na dalap ma mirier teip ga magaulap ganam. Eva, manit ara mirier pagap ganam. Are ratmat ga naganpang Morowa la nosagaong ga munuo.”
43016031	Pa upulo Iesu ties maiong gare ro, “Titot la naganming, a?”
